_header: To Thee Jesu my troth I plight
Subjects: inscriptions; Virgin Mary, prayers to; Virgin Mary and Christ, songs/prayers to; Christ, prayers to
_description: Inscription on a brooch — one couplet

Atkinson.Transcription:
to þe ihesu my trought I plightand to þe mary his moder
                    brigt
